mapper.select: select *from reply where b_no=#{b_no} order by r_ref,r_no
mapper.update: update reply set r_step=r_step+1 where r_ref=#{r_ref} and r_step>#{r_step}
mapper.select: select count(*)-1 from reply where b_no = #{b_no} and r_ref=#{r_ref}
mapper.update: update reply set r_reCnt=(select count(*) from reply where r_ref=#{r_no} and r_no != #{r_ref}) where r_no=#{r_ref}
update reply set r_state=1 where r_no=#{r_no}
